n that allows the Paladin to heal themselves or their allies by expending their pool of hit points. You can also use this to cure a target of its disease or neutralize the poison affecting the target. You can cure multiple diseases and neutralize multiple poisons with a single use of Lay on Hands, expending hit points separately for each one. Do note that this will have no effect on undead and constructs.
